articles.author: Staff Reports
articles.title: Immigrants chase the American Dream 'In the Heights' - Daily Journal
articles.description: Years before “Hamilton” debuted, it was a musical titled “In the Heights” that introduced the world to its creator Lin-Manuel Miranda. It was his first Broadway hit, winning the 2008 Tony Award for best musical and putting him on his path to critical acclaim.…
